effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The bodyguard has a double edge on this ability if it was previously used against the same target in this encounter.

items.name: Magnetic Pull
items.target: Each enemy and object in the area

effects.name: Special
effects.effect: This ability targets only metal-clad enemies and metal objects of size 3 or smaller.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target is pulled up to 8 squares, or if they have M<3, they are pulled up to 15 squares. The bodyguard can make a free strike against each target who ends this forced movement adjacent to them.

items.name: Valiar Cloak
items.trigger: One ally within distance is targeted by an enemy's ability. The bodyguard can use this ability after seeing the outcome of the power roll.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: The bodyguard becomes the triggering ability's target instead.
At the start of the bodyguard's turn, each servok within 2 squares of them regains 15 Stamina.
The bodyguard's shape can't be changed by any external effect.
While the bodyguard isn't bleeding, weakened, or winded, any power roll made against them is automatically a tier 1 outcome. A critical hit still grants its additional main action.
